PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Carpet Marketplace
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the carpet marketplace work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our carpet marketplace connects buyers with sellers of various carpet styles. You can browse listings, compare prices, and make purchases directly through our platform. Sellers can list their carpets with detailed descriptions and images.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What types of carpets are available?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We offer a wide range of carpets including oriental rugs, modern designs, wall-to-wall carpeting, area rugs, and eco-friendly options. You'll find carpets in various materials, sizes, and price ranges to suit your needs.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How can I ensure the quality of the carpet I'm buying?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Each listing includes detailed information about the carpet's material, construction, and condition. We also encourage sellers to provide high-quality images. Additionally, our user review system allows you to see feedback from previous buyers.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: What if I'm not satisfied with my purchase?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We have a customer-friendly return policy. If you're not completely satisfied with your carpet, you can return it within 30 days of delivery. Please refer to our return policy page for specific details and conditions.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Browse, Compare, and Purchase Quality Carpets from Top Brands
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our carpet marketplace
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the carpet marketplace work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our carpet marketplace connects buyers with sellers, offering a wide range of carpets. Browse listings, compare prices, and purchase directly through our secure platform.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What types of carpets are available?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We offer a diverse selection including Persian, Oriental, contemporary, shag, and eco-friendly carpets in various sizes, colors, and materials to suit every taste and budget.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How can I ensure the quality of the carpet I'm buying?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Each listing includes detailed photos and descriptions. We also have a rating system for sellers and encourage buyer reviews to help you make informed decisions.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: What if I'm not satisfied with my purchase?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Please check the specific return terms on each listing, as some custom or handmade carpets may have different policies.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: While we don't directly provide installation, many of our sellers offer this service. You can filter listings to find sellers who include installation or can recommend local professionals.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Unroll a World of Style and Comfort
FEATURE_1_BODY: Explore an extensive range of carpets from traditional to modern styles, all in one convenient marketplace.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Compare prices, materials, and designs side-by-side to find the perfect carpet for your space and budget.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Access professional tips and guidance from experienced carpet specialists to make informed decisions.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Shop with confidence using our safe and protected payment system for all your carpet purchases.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Read authentic feedback from real buyers to help you choose the best carpet for your needs.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Enjoy flexible shipping choices, including home delivery and in-store pickup, for your convenience.
